entry.title: Highlight of the week !
entry.content: Our manuscript on ‘Ranking Single Fluorescent Protein-Based Calcium Biosensor Performance by Molecular Dynamics Simulations’ was the #HighlightOfTheWeek by @JCIM_JCTC. Check out the movie
